t: RazorpayX | Amazon Branding Guidelines | Curlec Docs
s: Amazon Pay Gift Card is the product name. The 4-word product name should always be capitalized and should not be broken up. It is not a gift certificate or e-gift card. If you are describing the gift card value, display the rupee amount first.
